constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Tolworth Key Area of Change
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: Given the height and proximity of the proposed two storey double garage to neighbouring properties 10, 16 and 18 Broomfield Road, as well as 1-3 Derby Road, officers consider that the proposal with windows at first floor level facing to the rear, side and front elevations, would result in an unacceptable loss of privacy and undue sense of enclosure for the occupants of these neighbouring properties. Therefore, the proposed development is contrary to Policies D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the Council's Core Strategy 2012.

By reason of scale and design, the proposed double garage would appear overly bulky and prominent within the immediate surrounding area, and would not relate well to prevailing pattern and form of development within the area, thereby conflicting with Policies D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's Core Strategy 2012.
description: Demolition of existing pair of detached garage and erection of 2 nos detached outbuilding garages with home office over roof accomodation.
